National Novel Writing Month Forum Index -> Plot Doctoring Topic options Print Topic View mode Threaded Compact Oldest First Login To Post Mutant Goldfish Profile Re: Title generator? #3 50007 / 50000 words Joined: 11/9 2:22:34 From Pennsylvannia Posts: 240 Posted on: 11/18 16:53:37 Thank you so much! I am at a loss of a title, too. Hopefully, those generators will give me something to build on. _________________ Use of word "the:" 3,171. danieljameswest Profile Re: Title generator? #2 27994 / 50000 words Joined: 2005/11/5 20:50 From Newcaslte, England Posts: 18 Posted on: 11/18 16:51:13 A quick search on google reveals: http://www.fictionalley.org/primer/title.html http://mdbenoit.com/rtg.htm And this fantasy title generator: http://nine.frenchboys.net/novel.php And there's loads more ... _________________ Daniel James West Edited by danieljameswest on 2006/11/18 16:52:29 Sashakat Profile Title generator? #1 No Word Count Entered. Joined: 2005/11/4 19:06 Posts: 8 Posted on: 11/18 16:37:10 I've seen sites that have name generators or even plot generators. Is there a title generator anyone knows of? I am absolutely, completely at a loss for a title.
